reviewText:
This video is so well done and beautifully presented.  It takes all of the hateful charges of the Left, including the hate-America Media and the self-proclaimed Scholars/Professors on Campuses, and deals with them factually one by one.

We have a truly precious Nation with a splendid history that is being smeared and destroyed in our time and before our eyes...  everyone who is an American Citizen should watch this to see why America became great.  It will open your eyes and strengthen you against the endless Media and school assault aimed at bringing down our Country.
Superb movie all of Dinesh DSouzas materials are the best he is one smart guy!
Had a very interesting format, but could not make the connection to the World Without Her. However, it did hold my attention throughout the program.
